comment: I was sooo scared to take econ 3300 because of how hard everyone said it is. It definitely is hard but this professor breaks it down. You WILL definitely learn in this class. To get an A, you really have to go over his materials and master it. Be prepared to study

Gives an A if he likes you. Says not to worry about grades and those that work hard will get good grades, yet while grading he acts like you should be an expert on a software no one has ever seen or will use in the real world. Awful unorganized lectures, bad at relaying thoughts. Memorize test info in his words or STAY AWAY u wont do well.

I learned a lot in this course. Wish I had more time with the Arena software. Working with it on Mac was a nightmare. He tried his best to help with the issue. The software company should come up with a better solution if they want students to use it long term. The professor offered lot of extra credit to help with the grade.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This professor truly cares. It is a difficult course. He provides several resources and opportunities to succeed. He is always available outside of class both in person and by email. Start planning and working on your project well in advance following his suggestions. We did not and struggled.

Professor Paul cares. He wants you to succeed and he provides you with all the resources to make that happen. The tests are what you learn in class and he grades based on your EFFORT. He gives strong preferential treatment to students he likes, grades are secondary. Does not grade project the same for each person. Make him like you.

I took this class this Fall and earned a B. It is a difficult class but Professor Paul gave us many extra credit opportunities to succeed. He was always there to help when we needed help on our project or assignments.

DO NOT TAKE AS ELECTIVE. 2 exams, worth 50% of grade. Open note tests, but still very difficult. Book needed for 1 or 2 homework assignments and helps with tests. Offers extra credit - due to difficulty of the course it is almost required in order to get a decent final grade. Arena software can only be used in class. Very difficult overall.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I have not taken a class with Prof Paul, however, I was a student assistant for him. I wanted to make sure people know how nice and caring he is. Will work with you if you don't understand something and knows he can be hard to understand/hear sometimes. He is very easy to work with & thats a great quality to consider in finding a professor!!!!!

Hardest class I have ever taken. Dr. Paul was amazing! He really puts forth an effort on helping you pass this class. His response time to discussion posts/emails is impressive (10 min 95% of the time). Responses always detailed. Provides plenty of examples, study guides, & Q&A sheets. Lots of extra credit helped me pull a B. This professor cares!

Professor was okay. It's a boring subject, which he acknowledges, but he makes it a bit easier to understand. He offers some of extra credit, usually on low attendance days. His tests are extremely similar to the reviews he offers. Tests are entirely open note, but not open book. Easy B with little effort, easy A with a little dedication. Take him.

Dr. Paul is an excellent professor. While the content of the class is not easy, he is very clear in his lectures and breaks the information down so that it can be easily understood. His communications are very responsive and helpful if you have a problem. While there are only a handful of graded assignments and tests, he offers extra credit.

Professor Paul is a tough grader and will not help with homework questions. However, he does give extra credit. If you are taking this class online, watch his videos - they are very helpful. Do not miss any deadlines!!

Professor Paul is amazing. He will help you in every way possible if you are willing to put in the effort. He answers emails promptly. He gives several assignments that can be tricky, review sessions before each exam and also gives several bonus opportunities both on the exam and assignments to help improve your grade.

Would take another class with this professor! He is very clear with assignments though homework can be a little challenging. He gives a bunch of extra credit. The class consists only of tests and homework and the tests are all open book open note.  Just do the work and you'll get an A!

I was worried about this class after taking Basic Statistics from another professor - but this was MUCH easier!  Just an average amount of time reading material, watching the lectures, and doing the homework.   Professor gave lots of extra credit on homework and exams to help students be sucessful.

Take him. I took him over the summer and in class. Sit close to the front, because he speaks low. The subject matter is kind of bland, and can be challenging if you miss a day. But his tests are open note and open book, so WRITE EVERYTHING DOWN!! He is also VERY NICE and wants to help ALL of his students. Do the homework!! PAY ATTENTION!!

Dr. Paul was a great professor. I absolutely hate economics but he made it very enjoyable with lots of examples to ensure that we understood. His tests were open notes/open book as well so that was great too. We didn't really use the book as much but it was useful for when I didn't go to class and needed to learn the material.

Professor Paul cares a lot about his students. It is actually funny the extent to which he goes to make sure my questions were answered on time. He answer emails as if he is online 24/7. I would definitely take another class with him.

This subject was very hard for me, and taking it online was even harder.  Dr. Paul was very helpful answering questions quickly and clearly.  His review sessions for each test were an invaluable guide for study and preparation.  I ended up with a B.  Do the homework, do the reviews, and you'll do well even if it's a difficult subject for you too.

I can't say enough good things about this professor.  He is very helpful and like others have said he is very quick to respond to email and very thorough with his explanations.  He provides a useful video for exam reviews.  The class wasn't an easy one for me, but Professor Paul is probably the best professor I've ever had.

Professor Paul is incredibly knowledgeable and very prompt in responding to emails and giving necessary help. He provides extra credit on each and every exam and an extra credit assignment to help with grade. If you put in a decent effort, you will get a good grade. I definitely recommend him.
Dr. Paul is an excellent Professor. He is always available to provide required help. If you prepare using review exams and work on the assignments, it is quite easy to earn a good grade.

Very heavy accent, and thus hard to understand. He almost falls asleep during his ppt lectures online. Final is 30% of grade. Does not give clear examples, and help given doesn't answer any questions posed. Wouldn't recommend.

I took 4 week July session so very fast paced. I made an A, but I worked my BUTT off. Very hard and confusing if you miss class. Prof will help you with in class problems but will NOT help with homework at ALL. HW graded on right or wrong. Open note/book exams. Gives extra credit to boost exam grades.

Great professor, I recommend him. Took it online. Material super hard if you exempted from ECON2300. He provides ample notes. Very quick responding to emails and always available to meet if needed. Open notes for exams and final. Homework every week provides examples to help you.

Professor Paul is extremely nice. The class material is awful. I suggest taking him. Homework about every other week. Open note tests. The more the class INTERACTS the better. The material is dull but he shows he really cares about the students and wants them to succeed.
He gives lots of notes but sometimes they are difficult to understand. If you do all the homeworks and go to the exam review sessions you will do well in his class. Didn't really use the book at all.

he's a great teacher! he presents the material in a way everyone can understand. all tests are open book an open note!! attendance isnt required but you really can afford to miss any classes though or you'll miss alot of info

A very easy class. He has weekly homework problems that get easier as the semester goes on. He has two open note exams that are on campus (I took online). He is extremely quick to respond to questions and has grades up just as quickly. I would absolutely take this professor again!

Great Professor. His goal is for you to retain the material. His tests are open notes/book and he gives you all the info you will need. If you take good notes you shouldn't have a problem! The material is difficult but he is easily the BEST professor to take for this course. He is a really nice guy and good to look at too! Don't pass him up!

Good professor. Has a bit of an accent, but it's tolerable. The material isn't always easy, but tests are open book/open notes, and he goes over several examples every class. Attendance isn't mandatory, but you will get behind if you skip. Gives sample tests that are very helpful and gives many chances for extra credit. He wants you to do well.
Professor Paul is a great teacher. He is very helpful. I scored an A in first two midterms and was able to skip the final exam.

Avoid this professor. His accent is very annoying and the online class I took made it even more difficult to understand him. It is one thing to listen to him in the classroom but it is another to listen to him online while watching a power point presentation.

Professor Paul was a terrible professor. His teaching style is useless and he never explains "why", only how to go step by step through problems. Hardly a learning experience. He is rude, has an over-inflated sense of self importance, and his accent is annoying. Avoid this professor!

Recommended. He is helpful and accommodating if you need assistance, and he is very thorough in what he teaches. The tests are open-book/notes which is good because there are a LOT of formulas needed to succeed. You can exempt the final if you made an A on both exams, after extra credit and curve. Pretty dry sense of humor but he tries. OK overall.
This stuff isn't that hard. Just do the practice sheets that are given to you. I did find a lot of errors on the sheets and stopped doing them. May have been my demise. I ended up with a B...

Great Professor. Hard Class. If you want to do well YOU HAVE TO SHOW UP. Missing one class will JACK YOU UP! You need the book for some examples and z,t,and f charts. He has a strong accent (that he jokes about :) ) but if you listen and pay attention it shouldnt be a problem.
You need to attend class if you want to perform well on his exams. The information builds on itself so you have to stay on top of things. Easy A if you're willing to put some effort.

Can't say enough good things about him. The material is difficult but he gives you so many chances to do well. Gives homework assignments that help with tests. While attendance is optional tests are open note, so you need to go to do well. Is big on extra credit. Was able to exempt final by getting A's on the 2 tests.

Professor Paul is extremely knowledgeable and an excellent teacher.  Attendance is not mandatory, but you should expect to go to every class, and take good notes as the tests are open book and open notes.  I received an easy A just by paying attention.  Whoever gave this prof a bad rating obviously didn't care enough to go to class.

Prof. Paul is AWESOME! Econ 3300 is a very hard class! He will work with you until you fully understand the material. GO to class! It is very important if you want to make a good grade. He gives extra credit and his tests are open book & notes, so take good notes! I would def. take him again!!!

Not sure why people would highly recommend this guy.  I was supposed to graduate the semester I took him and could not because he gave me a D.  Not sure how I got a D he never returned the second exam grade so he could have made it up for all I know.  He barely speaks english so good luck understanding him.  Take him if you actually care about Econ

I would have never made it through this class without the extra credit points and homework points. This was the hardest stuff to learn. The Prof gives you many opportunities to get a decent grade. I did as well as I did because of his kind graces.

Great teacher. This is a hard class, but he will explain the material until you understand. He's also available in his office to answer any questions you may have. There's homwork, 2 tests and a final. He gives 15 points extra credit for all exams. Do the homework, and extra credit and you should do well.

highly reccomend this professor. Econ is not my thing but he's an amazing teacher. Gives 15pt take home extra credit pts on tests--which are open note, open book, and exactly what's on the review he gives out for the exam. If you get a 90 or above on the 2 tests you don't have to take the final. I made an easy A. Homework helps boost your grade.
Best prof. ever. CLass is super hard but he will work with you during his office hours and help you in any way he can. Sweet too! :)Open book, open notes text. If you try you will do well.

He makes it seem so easy. Very understanding professor. He gives you an opportunity to do well. The gives a study guide before each test. All test are open notes, also the final. Extra credit is also available for each test. If you do his assignments and really study the study guides, that's an easy A for you. Oh, ladies, he's HOT and SEXY too...lo

take him. subject is hard but he gives review/study guide which is almost the same with test. open book for all test and exams plus study guide sheet. very helpful. he his young and understanding. handsome tooo
Highly recommend. Not an easy subject but he does a good job of explaining and helping.

I considered dropping this class early but am glad I stuck it out as I made an A.  It's a very difficult class and you have to put some work in.  He gave 15 point extra credit, take home, problems on both tests which helped a LOT.  He also gave practice exams which were very helpful!

He is great! I was so not looking forward to taking this class. This is a hard class and you must stay on top the entire time. He was flexiable and very understanding. Took the class online and he was more than helpful. Highly recommend!

ppl are bein too hard on him. enjoyed his class. explains exactly what is going to be on the test. 3 test total. 1 takehome & 2 open notes & book. few homework assignments, help bring up grades. got a c. just what i deserved. easily couldve gotten an a/b. recommend. need to use excel. total hottie. answers quests. good explainer.

very good looking, smart and funny man but assumes everybody is interested in stats. he is very helpful as far as questions. subject is not easy. make sure you stay on top of things or you will be lost. no need to buy the book. hardly ever used it.

This class will make your head hurt no matter who teaches it. Prof Paul does a good job explaining the material. Learned mostly from notes. Text is confusing! Do not miss classes or you will be lost. DO YOUR HOMEWORK!!!
The guy can't explain anything and don't even try sending him an e-mail. He'd get you more confused. The prof. is useless.
No Comments
